about-text: Hi! My name is Kostya, and I am a frontend developer with experience in creating websites. I am 19 years old, and currently, I am studying Computer Engineering at the university. My skills include proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, as well as experience working with various frameworks such as React or Vue. I am passionate about creating user-friendly and creative user interfaces and constantly strive to improve my skills. Additionally, I have experience working on various commercial and non-commercial projects. I am looking forward to meeting new people and collaborating!
about-intro: Hi! My name is Kostya, I'm frontend developer.
